Articles.Content: That might be the most terrible video edit I have ever seen. Also, Michael Rosen does not appear to be dead. Why are you remembering him?

This kind of videos were a thing at 2010-2013 which were called Youtube Poop. But This may not be a good example. I selected it because it was about space. 

Since this trend died; we can do a remebering.

i recently re-discovered it. some memories came to mind. So I shared this.

On ‎10‎/‎1‎/‎2016 at 2:00 PM, rdem said:

This kind of videos were a thing at 2010-2013 which were called Youtube Poop. But This may not be a good example. I selected it because it was about space. 

Since this trend died; we can do a remebering.

i recently re-discovered it. some memories came to mind. So I shared this.

Actually I disagree. I think you need to broaden your horizons as I actually attended a YouTube livestream of a guy who was doing a live editing of his most recent Star Wars YTP not too long ago. They are still very much around, as to which specific thing their "pooping" is subject to change. Memes, popular events and so on will come and go. Doesn't mean the whole genre dies with it, in fact, I think it's reached it's peak popularity now more than ever since I'm hearing outside sources mentioning it more and more often.

Edited October 3, 2016 by ZooNamedGames
